DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare efficacy safety BRL49653C versus placebo concomitant use sulfonyl urea ( SU ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of BRL49653C For The Treatment Of Type 2 Diabetes ( Combination Therapy With Sulfonyl Urea ) -With Placebo Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients type 2 diabetes mellitus manage SU candidate study . These candidate check clinical laboratory data , must adequate blood , liver kidney function . Exclusion criterion : Patient serious cardiovascular disease serious hepatic disease eligible .
